breakdowns.description: Enables users to create, view, edit, and delete events, including specifying event name, description, start date, and end date.
Allows users to create, view, edit, and delete tasks, including specifying task title, description, and status (To Do, In Progress, Completed).

breakdowns.header: Assign and Organize Tasks by Event
breakdowns.description: Enables users to assign tasks to events during creation or later, view all tasks for a specific event, reassign tasks to different events, and remove tasks from events.
conditions: Each task must be associated with exactly one event
